thread.title: See inside Eugenie Bouchard's date with lucky fan at basketball game after honouring Super Bowl bet
thread.title_full: See inside Eugenie Bouchard's date with lucky fan at basketball game after honouring Super Bowl bet

author: Natalie Evans
title: See inside Eugenie Bouchard's date with lucky fan at basketball game after honouring Super Bowl bet
text:
Sport See inside Eugenie Bouchard's date with lucky fan at basketball game after honouring Super Bowl bet The tennis ace flew 20-year-old student John Goehrke to New York before taking him to a Brooklyn Nets game Share By Natalie Evans Mick Gadd 05:15, 16 FEB 2017 Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Eugenie Bouchard DOES go on 'Super Bowl Twitter Date' Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
When a fan bet Eugenie Bouchard he'd take her on a date if the New England Patriots won the Super Bowl, he didn't expect to be sitting next to the tennis beauty 10 days later. 
But that's exactly where John Goehrke found himself on Wednesday night after the Canadian sports star honoured the deal. 
Tennis ace Bouchard saw the funny side after prematurely celebrating the Atlanta Falcons' Super Bowl victory on Twitter. 
"Just met my 'Super Bowl Twitter Date' John. On our way to the (Brooklyn Nets) game!" Bouchard tweeted from New York. 
The Sports Illustrated swimsuit model later shared a video of the pair from their front row seats at the Barclays Center. 
The Nets lost 129-125 to the visiting Milwaukee Bucks but that didn't spoil lucky John's night. Eugenie posted a cheeky video on Twitter (Photo: Twitter/geniebouchard) John was caught on camera looking less than enthralled (Photo: Twitter/geniebouchard) 
Bouchard earlier said she was looking forward to heading out with the 20-year-old student from Missouri. 
She told Sports Illustrated: “I want to honor my word and stay true to it, so I’m going on that date and that’s actually tonight. 
"We’re going to go to the Brooklyn Nets game. He’s flying in this afternoon, so I look forward to meeting him tonight and I hope he enjoys it. And I hope it’s not too awkward." 
It seems it clearly wasn't as the 22-year-old shared a cosy selfie with her date from the back of a cab. 
She admitted: “After all the media attention it got, it was something I could, first of all, not back out of. There was no chance.. 
“I was worried, however, when I looked at his Twitter profile as soon as I lost the bet and his profile picture was a picture of Tiger Woods. I was like, ‘It’s one of those Twitter fans. I don’t even know what he looks like. What is going to happen?’ 
"But it turns out he seems to be a very nice boy. Patriots fan John Goehrke blagged his way into a date with Bouchard (Photo: Splash News) 
How it all came about will go down in history. 
As Atlanta led 21-3, Bouchard was keen to tell her followers on social media that she knew the Falcons would win . 
No team had ever overcome such a deficit in Super Bowl history, so it seemed like a long-shot when marketing student John replied to her tweet with the message: "If patriots win we go on a date?" 
Little did he expect to get a reply from the 2014 Wimbledon finalist, let alone a date, until when, at the end of overtime and with the Patriots completing an historic 34-28 overtime win, Bouchard replied: "So... where do you live?"
